TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FormattedText extends System.Object

summary.span: 在 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 應用程式中提供對繪製文字的低階控制。

span.span: Provides low-level control for drawing text in Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件可讓您繪製多行文字，可以個別格式化文字中的每個字元。The object allows you to draw multi-line text, in which each character in the text can be individually formatted. 下例顯示已套用多種格式的文字。The following example shows text that has several formats applied to it. ![使用 FormattedText 物件顯示的文字](~/add/media/formattedtext01.jpg "使用 FormattedText 物件顯示的文字")![Text displayed using FormattedText object](~/add/media/formattedtext01.jpg "Text displayed using FormattedText object") 格式化的文字字串的範例Example of a formatted text string 中的文字功能方面[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]，被視為 「 低層級 」，因為它會處理文字，做為圖形元素。In terms of text features in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], is considered "low-level" because it processes text as graphical elements. 文字中的其他層面[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]處理專用於文字的控制項的內容中的文字 (， )，實作非固定格式文件模型 (請參閱[非固定格式文件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/flow-document-overview.md))，或支援[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文件模型 (請參閱 < [WPF 中的文件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/documents-in-wpf.md))。Other aspects of text in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] handle text in the context of controls that are dedicated to text (, ), implement the flow document model (see [Flow Document Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/flow-document-overview.md)), or support the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document model (see [Documents in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/documents-in-wpf.md)). 中的 setter 方法的許多擁有與所支援的附加屬性的相似處，但附加的屬性套用至較高層級的文字支援流程或[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]。Many of the setter methods in have similarities to attached properties that are supported by , but the attached properties apply to the higher-level text support either for flow or [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]. ## Examples 下列範例會建立物件，並接著套用至文字的數個格式化樣式。The following example creates a object and then applies several formatting styles to the text. [!code-csharp[FormattedTextSnippets#FormattedTextSnippets1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FormattedTextSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#formattedtextsnippets1)] [!code-vb[FormattedTextSnippets#FormattedTextSnippets1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FormattedTextSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#formattedtextsnippets1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當文字轉換成物件，它不再是字元集合-您無法修改文字字串中的字元。When text is converted to a object, it is no longer a collection of characters - you cannot modify the characters in the text string. 不過，您可以修改其筆劃與填滿屬性來影響轉換文字的外觀。However, you can affect the appearance of the converted text by modifying its stroke and fill properties. 下列範例說明幾個方法可透過修改筆劃並填滿轉換的文字建立視覺效果。The following examples illustrate several ways of creating visual effects by modifying the stroke and fill of converted text. ![以不同的色彩填滿和筆劃的文字](~/add/media/outlinedtext03.jpg "以不同的色彩填滿和筆劃的文字")![Text with different colors for fill and stroke](~/add/media/outlinedtext03.jpg "Text with different colors for fill and stroke") 設定筆劃並填滿不同色彩的範例Example of setting stroke and fill to different colors ![影像筆刷套用至筆觸的文字](~/add/media/outlinedtext04.jpg "影像筆刷套用至筆觸的文字")![Text with image brush applied to stroke](~/add/media/outlinedtext04.jpg "Text with image brush applied to stroke") 影像筆刷套用至筆劃的範例Example of an image brush applied to the stroke 文字轉換成並轉譯為物件可能看起來不一樣為直接呈現的文字：Text that is converted to and rendered as a object may not look the same as text rendered directly: - 文字轉換成物件則不會呈現使用 ClearType。Text converted to a object is not rendered using ClearType. 此外，已轉換的基準線不齊整個顯示像素。In addition, the baseline of the converted is not snapped to a whole display pixel. - 小型的字型，例如常用的內文，可能會失去以利閱讀、 變得模糊，和外觀會有所不同。Small fonts, such as those commonly used in body text, may lose legibility, appear blurred, and vary in appearance. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立物件並擷取格式化的文字和其週框方塊的幾何。The following example shows how to create a object and to retrieve the geometries of the formatted text and its bounding box. [!code-csharp[OutlineTextControlViewer#CreateText](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/OutlineTextControlViewer/CSharp/OutlineTextControl.cs#createtext)] [!code-vb[OutlineTextControlViewer#CreateText](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/OutlineTextControlViewer/visualbasic/outlinetextcontrol.vb#createtext)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別指定要套用至文字的文字裝飾的類型。The class specifies the types of text decorations to apply to the text. 有四種類型的文字裝飾： 底線、 基準、 刪除線和頂線。There are four types of text decorations: underline, baseline, strikethrough, and overline. 這些會被稱為中的每個項目上所設定的值。These are described as values that are set on each item in the . 是很常見，集合包含只有一個裝飾，但該屬性會使用集合來藉由將多個裝飾套用至相同的文字，提供更進階的裝飾效果。It is common that the collection contains only one decoration, but the property uses the collection to provide for more advanced decoration effects by applying multiple decorations to the same text. 下圖顯示相對於文字的文字裝飾的位置。The following illustration shows the locations of the text decorations relative to the text. ![文字裝飾位置的圖表](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "文字裝飾位置的圖表")![Diagram of text decoration locations](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "Diagram of text decoration locations") 文字裝飾型別的範例Example of text decoration types 這個方法會設定整個文字字串。This method sets the for the entire text string. 若要設定子集的文字字串中，使用方法。To set the for a subset of the text string, use the method.
